title: Vi Q Bug [Gameplay]
body: So this occured me a couple of time now and it's getting really frustrating. The thing is when you use your Q on Vi and charge to someone if they flash right into your Q path you wont collide with them, you will go straight through them. Also alot of times I would charge my Q up and try to hit someone but it just goes though them and its really anoying trying to main her when I am getting cucked by a bug.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Champions Team is in the process of fixing a charging bug that affects several champions, Vi included. Thanks for the report! :)
